name: Defender Faith
description: Defender Faith is an atmospheric hardcore 2d platformer shooter. Pixel art is made in black white tones.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 1024 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
